description: Unified Interactive LLM Metrics Dashboard - Performance, Cost, and Provider Comparison in one view

options.content:
# RAG System - Interactive LLM Metrics (ITDM)
**Performance** | **Cost Analysis** | **Provider Comparison** — All metrics show LKE / EKS / GKE side-by-side. Edit pricing variables in dropdowns above.

panels.title: Provider Regions
panels.description:
🟢 LKE: Chicago (us-ord) | 🟠 EKS: N. Virginia (us-east-1) | 🔵 GKE: Iowa (us-central1)

North-South Test: Your machine → Internet → Cluster

options.content: **Reference Specs** (not live - update manually if instance types change): LKE g2-gpu-rtx4000a1-s (20GB VRAM, 6144 CUDA, Ada Lovelace) | EKS g5.xlarge (24GB VRAM, 9216 CUDA, Ampere) | GKE n1-standard-4+T4 (16GB VRAM, 2560 CUDA, Turing) | **Model:** Qwen/Qwen3-1.7B | **Embedding:** BAAI/bge-small-en-v1.5 | **Vector DB:** Qdrant

panels.title: 💰 Cost Analysis (edit pricing in dropdowns above)

options.content:
**Pricing (per node):**
| | LKE | EKS | GKE |
|---|---|---|---|
| GPU $/hr | $${lke_gpu_cost} | $${eks_gpu_cost} | $${gke_gpu_cost} |
| CPU $/hr | $${lke_cpu_cost} | $${eks_cpu_cost} | $${gke_cpu_cost} |
| Mgmt $/hr | $${lke_mgmt_cost} | $${eks_mgmt_cost} | $${gke_mgmt_cost} |

**Nodes:** ${gpu_nodes} GPU, ${cpu_nodes} CPU
